https://www.treatwell.co.uk/place/purple.name: Colour Packages (include Toning, Treatments And Finishing)

comment: First time visiting the salon and I will definitely be back again! Before starting, Luke asked me exactly what sort of blow-dry, if I wanted big curls or not which some salons don't ask. I was given after-care how to keep my curls in all night too which was nice. The salon is cute and welcoming. I like the idea of it only being the client and the hairdresser. It feels more personal and a lot more of a calmer environment. Can't wait to get my hair colored here soon!

Luke at Purple Rinse is amazing.
He gives great advice if you want to try something different! 
He cut my hair so well just before we went into Lockdown that it looked great for months!

Would definitely recommend :-)

Luke has coloured and cut my hair for years. It is always a fab experience and I always leave thrilled with the results. Luke is always really friendly and incredibly knowledgeable. He is able to interpret my slightly vague ideas and create exactly what I wanted. I have recommended him to so many people over the years and do not hesitate to continue to do so- you will not regret going to see him!

Luke is simply amazing! He always manages to pick exactly the right shade for my hair (even when I’m very vague!) and never complains, even though it’s so thick! Purple Rinse is definitely the place to go.
Awesome haircut. Good price.

Fair price and amazing job. 
Thanks
Perfect!
Great place very professional and friendly.
Great blow dry! Lasted for 3 days and looked amazing

Amazing result, great value for the price!
I got Olaplex treatment and a blow dry with Kadir, couldn’t be happier, my hair is super shiny and smooth, looks very healthy and glossy, exactly what I needed!
Amazing hair cut - honestly one of the best I've ever had. Booked in my next appointment before leaving the salon because it was just so good!!!
Everything was great! Thank you!
Kadir did an amazing job, my hair looks better than I could have imagined!!
The barber was extremely pleasant and polite, paid close attention to my requests, was thorough and careful, delivering the very best haircut that is also easy to maintain. Absolute perfection!
Great service, helpful and friendly
Top quality cut and shave. Really pleased.
Great Service, attention to details! Recommended!!
Rindi made me feel comfortable and at ease
Rindi was very helpful and accommodating.
Vanda is great and extremely talented. Not had a bad experience yet!
It's the best service and I would skways go back x
Amazing experience! Beautiful place, lovely people and they nailed the look. Just found my hairdresser in London, thanks Nora! :)
great as always
My visit to Flair was great. Elsa is a perfectionist and did my haircut exactly as I wanted. Thank you :)
Great reliable haircut and friendly service
Santana was brilliant. The first hairdressers to ask me specific questions to make sure that what I was asking for would specifically work for me. A really great experience.

https://www.treatwell.co.uk/place/abbevi.name: Ladies - Hair Colouring & Highlights With Blow Dry

comment: Love my hair cut! Lovely welcome and lovely salon, definitely recommend. Thank you Alex :)
Professional, friendly and efficient.
Excellent! An exceptional facial, thank you.
Very good! Will go back
Good salon, very efficient and quick.
great thank you
Really liked how the lady did my eyebrows!
Everyone was friendly and welcoming, I was greeted by Goli then was offered drink from other lady, the whole experience was quitr relaxing and professionaly done.
Very friendly and nice lady, she did an amazing job
Loved it
Combination of skills and harmony all in one place, he did a fab massage on areas needed
Master Li was so calm and really pro

https://www.treatwell.co.uk/place/sultan.name: Unlimited Sessions For Laser Hair Removal

comment: Friendly and professional service. Staff is very knowledgeable. Will return!
Great Blowdry as always!
Everything was perfect. Definitely I will go again!
Nice clean venue, good value for me. Chetna was very very good
Great Blowdry as always

Iam unable to have micrbladed eye brows due to the amount of blood thinners iam on so I had signature brow how magnificent I felt like a new woman can't believe the shape and colour give me loads of confidence  thankyou
Amazing, professional service, would highly recommend 😍
I’m more than happy with my Lip Blush. Tori took the time to listen to what I wanted as I’m quite fussy. She took her time and did a wonderful job. I’m made up just saving up for my next treatment.

Simply put, I would not trust anyone else with my micro blading!  
Tori-Anne explains everything so clearly, the after care is second to none and an amazing customer experience from consultation to treatment and ongoing care

Can't believe at nearly 80 years of age I've had both my eyebrows microbladed & my lip blush I was skeptical at first but I am completely overwhelmed with how fantastic my brows & lips are! Tori is a true professional no wonder she is award winning. 5 stars 👍 xxx
Great styling and attention to detail as well as great service
Very happy with both my cut and balayage. Went through the shade of the toner with Ella and it came out perfect! I'm very happy
Friendly staff, excellent service, will most definitely be coming back!

Ella was lovely but overall outcome of half head of highlights was disappointing- I'm still very dark and that 'half head' of foils blends too much, can't actually see I've had it done - frustrating spending money to re-do my grown out roots and not seeing the lightened desired effect anywhere near the roots as I asked for. But very friendly service.
My daughter is very happy from her hair cut , definitely recommend
Wonderful service and friendly technician!
From the very first moment she greeted me friendly, did the exact haircut I imagined in my head and she also finished with it pretty quick. I am happy with the overall experience.

Used for first time would highly recommend Enkeleida she is experienced and gave me the style I requested.

A friendly hairdresser made me feel welcomed will recommend to family and Friends. 

Thank you
Jess is really talented and gave me the sleekest bob. Thank you so much!

Staff at the salon were attentive and made me feel very welcome. 

Klod, is a very skilled professional and I'm very happy with the result of the treatment.
Staff were welcoming and proffesional. Thank you
It was painless, quick and Kiran was very professional.
Speedy and cordial service
Great service
Sim was amazing, she always do an incredible job, always helpful and makes you feel so comfortable! Thank you Sim for your amazing job! I will definitely come back!
Lovely staff and great wax - thank you!

My whole experience was great! All the staff were lovely and I'm very happy with my haircut with Mimosa who was very attentive and has great attention to detail. I highly recommend this salon and look forward to going back.
Awesome service. Everything was great
Great experience all round
A very friendly, family run salon. Very professional.  Always a lovely experience.
Experienced therapists who know what they are doing, in a relaxing atmosphere. I cant recomend this salon enough, from fabulous pedicures to relaxing massages -the place to visit!
Such a warm, friendly welcoming salon, with staff who have a wealth of experience & attention to detail.  They go above & beyond so your visit is such a treat every time.
Roberta’s is the best salon in Knutsford! Amazing facials using all the technologies, gorgeous massages too. Fab LVL lashes, spray tans, nails etc. they do it all! Highly recommend xx

https://www.treatwell.co.uk/place/gusto-.name: Ladies - Hair Colouring With Haircut & Blow Dry

comment: Lovely salon and staff! I was very pleased with my hair and how Olympia listened to what I wanted whilst giving her own input.
Fantastic haircut and blow dry - as ever - at Gusto. Yianis is wonderful, and I can't see myself going anywhere else for my hair! Couldn't recommend more highly
I was left with an uneven length and choppy poorly blended layers. My hair was curled at the end of appointment so there was no way of seeing how the cut really looked before I left the salon.
Thank you for nice haircut 💇🏼‍♀️
Fatuu was amazing did exactly what I asked for!!!

My hair is great and I absolutely love it. However, I booked my hair under the illusion of a flash sale, and with hair usually costing me a lot, I jumped on it. However, when we got to the end of my session I was asked to pay for both toner and ‘extra time’ which amounted to an extra £60. Which meant my hair was way out of my price range. At no point along way I was told that the extra time and the toner would cost more. I feel as if I have been taken advantage of.
Federico was really lovely and very professional. Love my hair cut, looks so much healthier now! Would definitely recommend Live True London to a friend.
Amazing as always. Love getting my hair cut here, i always come out smiling.
I've done my lashes yesterday and they look incredible :) very natural and light, just the way I wanted them to be. Thanks T - you're the best. I highly recommend this place.
Great service, very high quality. My lashes look beautiful and are long to heaven! In addition, a very nice time spent with a professional. I recommend services with all my heart!

I've tried a few lash technicians around London now and Inhype Beauty is my favourite by far. I've received so many compliments following my session. This is the best experience I've had and I would recommend anyone who wants to get their lashes done to try. I completely trust to do my lashes and there's been a clear difference on how my eyes feel after going to her compared to ones I've gone to in the past.

Tamara is the best eyelash technician I ever had before. Her lashes are so beautiful, full but still natural and stay like forever!
Best lash place in London with reasonable price!
I got my eyelash extensions from Inhype Beauty and I’m so impressed! The whole experience was relaxing and extremely professional. Definitely make an appointment- you won’t be disappointed!
